description: Enterprise techniques used by Hacking Team UEFI Rootkit, ATT&CK software S0047 v1.1
name: Hacking Team UEFI Rootkit (S0047)

techniques.comment: Hacking Team UEFI Rootkit is a UEFI BIOS rootkit developed by the company Hacking Team to persist remote access software on some targeted systems.[1]
